description: Numbers n such that n^2 + 1, n^2 + 3, n^2 + 7 and n^2 + 9 are all primes.
mathematica: Select[ Range[ 2, 10^6, 2 ], PrimeQ[ #^2 + 1 ] && PrimeQ[ #^2 + 3 ] && PrimeQ[ #^2 + 7 ] && PrimeQ[ #^2 + 9 ] & ] Select[Range[2,1000000,2],And@@PrimeQ[#^2+{1,3,7,9}]&](* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 03 2012 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 09 2000
